grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 霊芝【レイシ】bracket fungus (Ganoderma lucidum), reishi mushroom
kun reading compounds: 高麗芝【こうらいしば】Korean lawn grass
道芝【みちしば】roadside grass, roadside weeds, guidance (sometimes esp. referring to guidance in love), guidepost, guide, Chinese fountain grass (Pennisetum alopecuroides)
